text: I have created an access token for you as a read only role. token: ZZZZZZZZZZZ

We would like to get intimate with your code, and need only read-only access. Please add Trelliz with a read role account to your GitHub using the steps described here: https://docs.github.com/en/issues/planning-and-tracking-with-projects/managing-your-project/managing-access-to-your-projects
Yes, this is our Gartner Peer Insight, worth taking into account: https://www.gartner.com/reviews/market/security/vendor/qwerty/product/qwerty/alternatives
Are there any other interesting references or publicly published data that Reagle may missed that can help better understand your story? If you do, please share the URL.
Good, it worked. Do you have a user guide for your product? If you do, please upload it?

Hi Matthew! For the initial setup process, Trellize would like to get to know Qwerty.com better. We have already accessed your website, published press-releases, and other publicly accessible data. We would like to ask for your portal access, for us to know better your product. Assuming you have a demo account for prospect meetings, can you provide us with the credentials for this account?
